title: Best of The Herd for Apr 16, 2020

description:
Michael Jordan says this new documentary will make people think less of him, Colin disagrees

College sports can't rely on football to pay for everything

Trade rumors always get denied in the NFL, doesn't mean they aren't true


Guests: Brian Kelly, Notre Dame Head Coach

Sam Smith, Author of The Jordan Rules
